feed.title: Sync-in Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Sync-in: v1.1.0
entry.content:
Features

  • backend: add option to enable log colorization (1d3e552)
  • backend: add shebang to allow CLI execution (cfca2b1)
  • frontend:sync: add createDirectory flag when electron dialog is open (58a0124)

Bug Fixes

  • frontend:recents: handle MIME image load error with fallback function (27266e5)

entry.title: New release for Sync-in: v1.1.1
entry.content:
Bug Fixes

  • backend:users: prevent members of isolated groups from seeing their group and its members (bbf4082)
  • Dockerfile: use port 8080 (8167ad8)
  • frontend:app: display the correct version of the package (2d0a83e)
  • frontend:users: properly update websocket connection on admin impersonation and return (5cf1e75)

entry.title: New release for Sync-in: v1.2.0
entry.content:
Features

  • config: allow SYNCIN_ env vars to override default config (c1fcd61)
  • docker: add PUID/PGID env variables (c674b73)

Bug Fixes

  • backend:sendfile: properly encode file paths with special characters and await call to catch errors (2bf2284)
  • frontend:files: detect .mp4 video files properly (4df92a5)
  • frontend:files: keep aspect ratio for images with large width (#4) (8ac398a)
  • frontend:layout: increase context menu trigger timeout to ensure full rendering (3c19bce)
  • frontend:shares: duplicate children in recurseChildrenShares (09d7b6d)
  • frontend:styles: fix right sidebar menu height (4c871d8)

Security Fixes

  • backend:security: prevent path traversal & SSRF (d79d28c)

Community Highlights ‚ù§Ô∏è

A big thank you to Alex Zalo ( @zalo-alex ) for his security audit.
Thanks to his expertise, several vulnerabilities were identified and patched in this release.
His contribution is truly valuable to us, and we‚Äôre grateful to have him as part of the Sync-in community üéâ

Good news never comes alone!
We‚Äôre thrilled to welcome Tibs ( @7185 ) to the Sync-in organization üåü !
A big thank-you to him for stepping in and supporting the community.

entry.title: New release for Sync-in: v1.2.1
entry.content:
Bug Fixes

  • backend:files: await lock creation to prevent premature destruction (05f1a98)
  • backend:files: remove duplicate extension on compressed archives introduced by path-traversal security patch (9deeafc)
  • backend:files: restore folder upload regression after path-traversal patch (3204fd0)
  • backend:users: support client WebSocket IP from x-forwarded-for when trustProxy is enabled (3e66c40)
  • docker: use INIT_ADMIN env var to control admin account creation (c6bb358)
  • frontend:files: correct folder drag-and-drop for browsers without webkitRelativePath (e0115ec)
